# deckthehalls

A festive terminal Christmas card for the Python community.

## Usage

```sh
uvx deckthehalls
```

That's it! Run it a few times to see different code snippets and color themes.

## What You'll See

- A colorful ASCII Christmas tree
- Randomly selected festive Python code snippets
- Syntax highlighting with random Pygments themes
- A warm holiday message
